page.title: DeFi for Aptos
page.description: Complete directory of DeFi protocols for di Aptos blockchain

search.no_results: We no find protocols wey match your criteria.

Leveraged Farming.description: Borrow funds to increase liquidity provision and amplify farming rewards

Yield Aggregator.description: Automatically find and switch between di best yield opportunities

protocol_descriptions.Panora: "Meta-DEX" wey dey plug into on-chain order-book and 10+ AMMs, dey split orders across pools while e dey curate canonical token list wey dey auto-update for im UI.
protocol_descriptions.Kana: Routes swaps across nine chains; Paymaster contract dey let users trade for Aptos without holding APT for gas; orderbook-based perp engine.
protocol_descriptions.Thetis: Thetis bundle spot aggregator, 50× perpetuals, and liquidity-bootstrapping pools (LBPs) under one roof.
protocol_descriptions.Anqa: Claims 99% liquidity coverage across 15+ Aptos DEXes; real-time sampling previews slippage before you sign and lets you batch multi-token swaps to save gas.
protocol_descriptions.LiquidSwap: Pontem flagship AMM and di first DEX live for Aptos mainnet; offers classic Uniswap-V2 pools, stable-swap curve, and formally-verified concentrated-liquidity design.
protocol_descriptions.Econia: Hyper-parallel on-chain order-book optimized for Aptos optimistic concurrency; processes markets in parallel with sub-second finality and exposes full REST/MQTT data stack.
protocol_descriptions.Cellana: ve(3,3) AMM where veNFT voters direct emissions and capture 100% of fees.
protocol_descriptions.PancakeSwap: Binance flagship DEX clone im V2 AMM onto Move and bridge some CAKE liquidity to Aptos.
protocol_descriptions.SushiSwap: Sushi execute im first non-EVM integration, enabling cross-chain routes wey settle for Aptos while preserving di familiar Trident router UX.
protocol_descriptions.Hyperion: Fully on-chain hybrid Order-book + CL-AMM wey leverage Aptos throughput for HFT-style trading.
protocol_descriptions.Tapp: Di first hook-enabled, Uniswap V4-style modular DEX for Aptos testnet; smart-contract hooks let builders compose custom pools while users get programmable swaps.
protocol_descriptions.Merkle: Gamified perp DEX with XP, loot-boxes, and 150× leverage; more than $20b of total volume.
protocol_descriptions.AGDEX: Offers 1-100× cross-margin perps with low-impact oracle fills keep slippage tight for retail traders.
protocol_descriptions.Pump: Anyone fit mint meme tokens via bonding curves; every coin na fair-launched with no presale or team allocation.
protocol_descriptions.Emojicoin: Lets users mint tokens mapped 1-to-1 with Unicode emojis; each launch use Econia CL-AMM curve for instant price discovery and speculation.
protocol_descriptions.Aries: Di first Compound-style money market for Aptos, upgraded with 90%-LTV E-Mode, integrated bridging, and spot trading for one interface.
protocol_descriptions.Superposition: Advanced risk management platform inspired by Bank of England FHS VaR, offering leveraged yield opportunities with real-time risk monitoring and dynamic collateral factor adjustment.
protocol_descriptions.Joule: Combine isolated lending pools with "Liquidity Anchors" for leveraged farming.
protocol_descriptions.Echelon: Lending hub wey support both E-Mode and isolated markets.
protocol_descriptions.Aptin: Security-first lending platform wey use di Move Prover for formal verification and granular, isolated-pool risk controls.
protocol_descriptions.Meso: Capital-efficient lending with user-configured debt ceilings and Safety Module wey backstop protocol shortfalls.
protocol_descriptions.TruFin: Enterprise-grade liquid staking; users receive TruAPT in exchange for staking APT.
protocol_descriptions.Amnis: Dual-token system issue stAPT (yield-bearing) and amAPT (stable), letting users toggle between yield and stability while routing validator commission back to stakers.
protocol_descriptions.Kofi: MEV-boosted liquid staking with leveraged-LSD vaults.
protocol_descriptions.Ichi: Automated Liquidity Manager vaults let projects seed single-sided liquidity; smart ranges rebalance to cut impermanent loss while treasuries earn swap fees for their native token.
protocol_descriptions.Vibrant X: Yield-optimizer and portfolio dashboard wey reallocate deposits to top-APY Aptos pools.
protocol_descriptions.Moar: Building leveraged-farm layer with cross-protocol credit accounts enabling users to borrow for one place and deploy for another.
protocol_descriptions.Thala: Suite of DeFi apps featuring multi-pool AMM, di over-collateralized MOD stablecoin, and liquid-staking via sthAPT and thAPT.
protocol_descriptions.Mirage: Composable liquidity layer powering DeFi next frontier. Deposit collateral and borrow self-repaying stablecoin loan powered by perpetuals. Features fully on-chain perps with CEX-like experience, instant execution, low fees, and up to 100x leverage.

mirage.description: Composable liquidity layer powering DeFi next frontier. Deposit collateral and borrow self-repaying stablecoin loan powered by perpetuals with up to 100x leverage.
mirage.feeStructure: Dynamic fee structure based on trading volume and position size. Competitive rates for perpetual futures trading.

integration.description: Fully on-chain perpetuals with CEX-like experience. All positions, vaults, and orders dey tokenized as NFTs for secondary market trading.
